name: VikingStory
description:
A great story about an equally great Viking who went to distant lands for gold, but met hordes of bloodthirsty monsters on his way, but the brave conqueror is equipped with a sword and bow that will help him on his way to huge treasures and the last great king of all monsters.

VikingStory-Hurricane 2d platformer, where you play as a Viking conqueror, who uses a sword and bow to deal with monsters, buy upgrades for broken gold, climb walls and deftly Dodge dangerous plants that disguise themselves as flowers, danger lurks around!

Feature of game:
- Improvements
- Many levels
- Final Boss
- Beautiful graphics
- Complexity
